Package homeautomation.sensors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHumiditySensor
    Parent interface for a humidity sensor.
    IMotionDetectorCallback
    This interface method is called if a motion detector detects something.
    ISensor
    Generic interface for all sensors.
    ITemperatureSensor
    Parent interface for a temperature sensor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dht22
    Representation of a DHT22 temperature and humidity sensor.
    DS18B20TemperatureSensor  
    DS18B20TemperatureSensorStub  
    RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor
    Wrapper for the functionality to access the motion sensor.
    SensorInformation
    Helper class to represent sensor information.
    TinkerforgeAmbientLightSensor
    Wrapper for a Tinkerforge temperature sensor.
    TinkerforgeHumiditySensor
    Wrapper for a Tinkerforge temperature sensor.
    TinkerforgeTemperatureSensor
    Wrapper for a Tinkerforge temperature sensor.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Dht22.Mode
    The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
    ISensor.SensorModel  
    ISensor.SensorType  
    RaspPiMotionDetectionSensor.Mode
    The dummy mode is used for debugging where the physical sensor is not available.
